name: DeleteGithubFile
description:
Delete a file from a GitHub repository.

This tool deletes a specified file from a GitHub repository. It should be called when you need to remove a file, ensuring that either committer or author details such as name and email are provided. This action cannot be done concurrently with file creation or updates.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository in a case-insensitive format.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository from which the file will be deleted. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: The file path in the repository to be deleted. This path is case-sensitive.

value_schema.description: path parameter

parameters.name: commit_message
parameters.description: The commit message explaining why the file is being deleted. This information is mandatory.

value_schema.description: The commit message.

parameters.name: file_sha_to_delete
parameters.description: The SHA of the file to be deleted. This is required to identify the specific file version in the repository.

value_schema.description: The blob SHA of the file being deleted.

parameters.name: author_email
parameters.description: Email of the author or committer for the commit. Required if using author or committer details.

value_schema.description: The email of the author (or committer) of the commit

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.description: The name of the author or committer of the commit. Required if 'author' is used.

value_schema.description: The name of the author (or committer) of the commit

parameters.name: branch_name
parameters.description: The name of the branch from which to delete the file. Defaults to the repository's default branch (usually 'master').

value_schema.description: The branch name. Default: the repository’s default branch (usually `master`)

parameters.name: committer_email
parameters.description: The email of the committer for the commit. This is required for deleting a file.

value_schema.description: The email of the author (or committer) of the commit

parameters.name: committer_name
parameters.description: The name of the committer or author of the commit for deleting the file.

value_schema.description: The name of the author (or committer) of the commit

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: path parameter

value_schema.description: The name of the author (or committer) of the commit

value_schema.description: The branch name. Default: the repository’s default branch (usually `master`)

parameters.description: The email of the author (or committer) of the commit

parameters.description: The commit message.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
